395a7(mdo sde): lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis
395b1(mdo sde): rnam par bsams pa dang / / las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dge'i las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni
395b2(mdo sde): bdag gnas bgyi/ / stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams
395b3(mdo sde): cad bshags par bgyi/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyis pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang
395b4(mdo sde): yid kyis kyang / / bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzang
395b5(mdo sde): sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ / stobs bcu mi mnyam sman sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam pa
395b6(mdo sde): bar/ / lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang //
395b7(mdo sde): srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyi ma nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa'i nyam nga dag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi mnyam
396a1(mdo sde): mngon sum mchis nas ni/ / sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal
396a2(mdo sde): ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/ / rgyal ba de dag rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od// dri med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya yi yan lag spun// sangs
396a3(mdo sde): rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ / thugs rje'i 'od gzer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag
396a4(mdo sde): dri med gser 'dras khyab/ / nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa zla ba'i 'od gzer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag
396a5(mdo sde): mdzes/ / dpe byad bzang po dag gi sa yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od gzer 'dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs//
396a6(mdo sde): dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od gzer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pa// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de
396a7(mdo sde): ya se mdzes/ / mya ngan 'khrug pa'i mchi chu dga' ba'i dba' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen 'phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/
396b1(mdo sde): bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od gzer mang po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis
396b2(mdo sde): yan lag rnams spras pa/ / sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i tshun dpag med dang // ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha'
396b3(mdo sde): mtshungs med dang / / ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ni mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar
396b4(mdo sde): gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ / yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshed tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na
396b5(mdo sde): shes par nus kyang srid/ / sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzang po
396b6(mdo sde): brgyad cus brgyan pa yis/ / sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi rang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'gro la
396b7(mdo sde): phan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi/ / sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar par bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi/
397a1(mdo sde): bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla
397a2(mdo sde): med rdzogs par bgyi/ / nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags gti mug zhe sdang zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi//
397a3(mdo sde): thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las
397a4(mdo sde): rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi/ / dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhir gyur// sems can
397a5(mdo sde): dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/ / de kun de'u dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las
397a6(mdo sde): thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun sgre'u bsdigs gsod thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis 'phongs gyur pa// sems can
397a7(mdo sde): nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ / 'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdeg cing ba cing bas bcings gzir ba// 'phongs pa sna tshogs ngag na gnas
397b1(mdo sde): gyur cing / / nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar
397b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ gsang ba rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ 'phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can thams cad bkres sred skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs
397b3(mdo sde): rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'o na pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed 'gyur// sems can dbul pos
397b4(mdo sde): gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sems can thams//
397b5(mdo sde): cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skem rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de
397b6(mdo sde): dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u bi wang sgra snyan dang // chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dang // gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma can// zas sgom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser
397b7(mdo sde): rin chen sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya/ / de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams
398a1(mdo sde): cad kha dog rgya chen dang / / phan tshun du na 'od byed gyur par sho// mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsams par skye ba de dag gyur// bsam
398a2(mdo sde): thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang / bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las
398a3(mdo sde): dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul
398a4(mdo sde): bral dri med bstan pa'i chos la yang / / phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad spod gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal
398a5(mdo sde): po dam pa po gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ spyan dang grags pa
398a6(mdo sde): gzugs dang kha dog gis/ / bskal ba du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtog tu por gyur te// dpa'i zhing rtul pod ma laso shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu
398a7(mdo sde): byang chub byir spyod gyur/ / pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dgan rin chen shing dbang drug// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rin chen be cu'i// khri la btsugs pa dag ni mang/
398b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras
398b2(mdo sde): thob pa/ / de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i theg pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings
398b3(mdo sde): pa bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar par myur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna
398b4(mdo sde): tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa/ / de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi// bdag gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams de// bdag gis smon grub 'bras bu
398b5(mdo sde): yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa
398b6(mdo sde): drug cur ngan song spong bar gyur/ / tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran
398b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag kun ni de 'drar 'gyur//
399a1(mdo sde): gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grag gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi lam yin lnga min bcu la min/
399a2(mdo sde): de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gnas nas dge ba byas ma yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// / 'phagra
399a3(mdo sde): pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gnyis pa/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par
399a4(mdo sde): bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i
399a5(mdo sde): 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar byung gyur pa dang // phyogs bcu'i
399a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na gang gzhes pa/ / rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu
399a7(mdo sde): gda'/ / dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags par gsungs// bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha
399b1(mdo sde): 'dra/ / kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spun ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che
399b2(mdo sde): zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtswa dung 'dra yang // be DUR+Ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zad pa 'dra//
399b3(mdo sde): sku yi lte bzung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam
399b4(mdo sde): zhing dam pa'i mchog rab 'phags/ / spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil pa ste// mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar
399b5(mdo sde): sngol mdzes/ / bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems
399b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyang tshim/ / sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag/ yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas rim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams
399b7(mdo sde): ni thams cad zhi/ / kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri
400a1(mdo sde): med zhal/ / gzhon nu btsas 'dra sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis non pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis
400a2(mdo sde): bskyod pa bzhin/ / 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od gzer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong pas rab tu lhag ge'o// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu
400a3(mdo sde): snang / / sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan byed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par gyur// sangs
400a4(mdo sde): rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod
400a5(mdo sde): nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ / yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul
400a6(mdo sde): dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/ / phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i//
400a7(mdo sde): ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dang ni// dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po
400b1(mdo sde): mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/ / bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad
400b2(mdo sde): brjod mi nus/ / bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang
400b3(mdo sde): ba skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi/ / bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas//
400b4(mdo sde): bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa
400b5(mdo sde): ni/ / ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga lta zhing // der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal stong
400b6(mdo sde): pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ / skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang dag bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan
400b7(mdo sde): bapar dgyi/ / nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyin nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi/
401a1(mdo sde): bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar
401a2(mdo sde): bgyi/ / der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu pho de dag gnyis ka dang // byang chub
401a3(mdo sde): bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing // skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang
401a4(mdo sde): dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal
401a5(mdo sde): par byang chub sprad par bgyi/ / gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs
401a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par
401a7(mdo sde): shog/ byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba
401b1(mdo sde): rnam dag gyur/ / ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur
401b2(mdo sde): cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spad par bgyi//
401b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dge zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing //
401b4(mdo sde): ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
401b5(mdo sde): bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo
401b6(mdo sde): rnams gzhan dag tu/ / stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyus bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par
401b7(mdo sde): mi shes pas/ / chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes
401'a1(mdo sde): 'gyur dang / / sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di
401'a2(mdo sde): grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ / dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs
401'a3(mdo sde): gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi
401'a4(mdo sde): dbang po chos rnams rnam par spong / / dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul du rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la
401'a5(mdo sde): rnam par spyod/ / ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab
401'a6(mdo sde): tu shes/ / de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab shes te// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos//
401'a7(mdo sde): sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba
401'b1(mdo sde): med cing byed pa med/ / snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra ba gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/
401'b2(mdo sde): grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang //
401'b3(mdo sde): gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// se yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang //
401'b4(mdo sde): 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// mi yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam
401'b5(mdo sde): shes kun tu gnas nas dong / / lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shig cin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis
401'b6(mdo sde): gang / / mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhi na gang zag dang /
401'b7(mdo sde): chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni//
402a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// ma rig pa ni gzhan yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig pa 'di yod pa ma yin
402a2(mdo sde): te/ de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga
402a3(mdo sde): shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems
402a4(mdo sde): kyis rnam dpyad dang / / bdag gis lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol// phung po gnas la stong par gyur pa ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par
402a5(mdo sde): gyis/ / ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni bdud rtsi grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ nga ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi//
402a6(mdo sde): rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las
402a7(mdo sde): rgyal/ / ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs
402b1(mdo sde): gyur pa/ / rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs sems gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du ma sngon chad
402b2(mdo sde): ngas/ / 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su 'tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag
402b3(mdo sde): mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang / / nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// be DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtsa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang /
402b4(mdo sde): nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcang gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par//
402b5(mdo sde): phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can
402b6(mdo sde): kun gyi shes pa gang / / de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams
402b7(mdo sde): kyis/ / thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang
403a1(mdo sde): du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen
403a2(mdo sde): po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bgos nas
403a3(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
403a4(mdo sde): 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin
403a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad
403a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim
403a7(mdo sde): thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
403b1(mdo sde): rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/
403b2(mdo sde): nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa
403b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya chen
403b4(mdo sde): yang dag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi/ lha'i lus 'di gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar
403b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug
403b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos
403b7(mdo sde): kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzang
404a1(mdo sde): pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'brog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu
404a2(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu/ rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/
404a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling
404a4(mdo sde): 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis
404a5(mdo sde): gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar
404a6(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser
404a7(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag
404b1(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo
404b2(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin
404b3(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
404b4(mdo sde): bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba
404b5(mdo sde): dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos na mi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
404b6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas
404b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/
405a1(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa
405a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad bas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/
405a3(mdo sde): yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs
405a4(mdo sde): so/ / rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
405a5(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas la chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems
405a6(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi
405a7(mdo sde): phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub pa la brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
405b1(mdo sde): 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi
405b2(mdo sde): ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
405b3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang /
405b4(mdo sde): g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang / lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyuraro// lham yin rnams dapham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pa
405b5(mdo sde): rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis
405b6(mdo sde): shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas
405b7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig
406a1(mdo sde): tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
406a2(mdo sde): to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul
406a3(mdo sde): 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang
406a4(mdo sde): la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen nam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid
406a5(mdo sde): dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod
406a6(mdo sde): de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang // dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod
406a7(mdo sde): sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag
406b1(mdo sde): cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/
406b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs po'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang
406b3(mdo sde): 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sprod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyin pa dang / rim gro
406b4(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
406b5(mdo sde): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs
406b6(mdo sde): su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
406b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa
407a1(mdo sde): bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das na ma dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du/ bdag dpung gi tshogs yan
407a2(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu lu der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi
407a3(mdo sde): brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de/ rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang
407a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po rang
407a5(mdo sde): gi yul du phyin na gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha
407a6(mdo sde): rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshegs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
407a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus
407b1(mdo sde): mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de bshul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//
407b2(mdo sde): bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi ba yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen
407b3(mdo sde): po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
407b4(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa de dag la
407b5(mdo sde): kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig
407b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bslab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su
407b7(mdo sde): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
408a1(mdo sde): gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang thogs shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi
408a2(mdo sde): rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri
408a3(mdo sde): bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par
408a4(mdo sde): 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thib pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul
408a5(mdo sde): gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dag nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dire grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i
408a6(mdo sde): sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung
408a7(mdo sde): dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can
408b1(mdo sde): du 'gyur/ dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud khor thams cad kyang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs
408b2(mdo sde): bar rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'beb par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs
408b3(mdo sde): spod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i
408b4(mdo sde): khong khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen par 'gyur
408b5(mdo sde): te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/ bla mar
408b6(mdo sde): byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam
408b7(mdo sde): ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjing chen po
409a1(mdo sde): yang rnam par 'phel lo/ / khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang bskyed do// khyed gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel
409a2(mdo sde): lo/ mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro//
409a3(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad
409a4(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzug
409a5(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams
409a6(mdo sde): cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi
409a7(mdo sde): ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang /
409b1(mdo sde): yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs
409b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro//
409b3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi
409b4(mdo sde): bzang de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang
409b5(mdo sde): bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar
409b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'di/
409b7(mdo sde): la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
410a1(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul
410a2(mdo sde): na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/
410a3(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang
410a4(mdo sde): du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o//
410a5(mdo sde): der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon
410a6(mdo sde): po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ / phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po nges
410a7(mdo sde): lus bkru bar bgyi'o/ / gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis
410b1(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ / der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems
410b2(mdo sde): kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun
410b3(mdo sde): mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyul bu
410b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad le yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
410b5(mdo sde): sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ / dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po
410b6(mdo sde): bde bar bgyi'o/ / bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o//
410b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos
411a1(mdo sde): thams cad dkar po sa ra pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ / spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// de'i phyir gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o//
411a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de
411a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba
411a4(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de skad du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
411a5(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par
411a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur//
411a7(mdo sde): grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang
411b1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyis shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa
411b2(mdo sde): dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod
411b3(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu
411b4(mdo sde): bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
411b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
411b6(mdo sde): pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten
411b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ / deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// dang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
412a1(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
412a2(mdo sde): rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi
412a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
412a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
412a5(mdo sde): po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng
412a6(mdo sde): bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la
412a7(mdo sde): bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng
412b1(mdo sde): bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi
412b2(mdo sde): ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
412b3(mdo sde): bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la/ mi'i rgyal po de dag chos la gus pa 'di lta bus bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed
412b4(mdo sde): cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod
412b5(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
412b6(mdo sde): tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol
412b7(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal
413a1(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser
413a2(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang
413a3(mdo sde): bgyid/ bla mer bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag pa phyog ba dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs
413a4(mdo sde): kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad
413a5(mdo sde): cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos chab
413a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs
413a7(mdo sde): rnams las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos
413b1(mdo sde): dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba
413b2(mdo sde): des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
413b3(mdo sde): pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi
413b4(mdo sde): sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i
413b5(mdo sde): 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bor snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi
413b6(mdo sde): gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro/ / spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas
413b7(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
414a1(mdo sde): dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i
414a2(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spros sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na pog snod gcig
414a3(mdo sde): thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams byung bar gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad
414a4(mdo sde): na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rib bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen
414a5(mdo sde): po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes
414a6(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya
414a7(mdo sde): po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang rang
414b1(mdo sde): gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spros dri rgya chen po yang ma ram par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa
414b2(mdo sde): rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas pa 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag stong gsum gyi steng rin po'i
414b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa med
414b4(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos chab sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser pod dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus
414b5(mdo sde): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs
414b6(mdo sde): rgyurgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna
414b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba marnam par 'gyur
415a1(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par
415a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur//
415a3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyed gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon
415a4(mdo sde): ton bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo
415a5(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa
415a6(mdo sde): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
415a7(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
415b1(mdo sde): / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gsum pa// de ras phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
415b2(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi 'dir bzhugs pa dag gis de'i ro de'i dus ra tshig gcig
415b3(mdo sde): dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis/ dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying
415b4(mdo sde): por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa
415b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur//
415b6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes
415b7(mdo sde): bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs
416a1(mdo sde): dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa ldong byang chub kyi rlung po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub depe med pa rab tu zhi
416a2(mdo sde): rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par
416a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos
416a4(mdo sde): kyi dung bla na med pa 'bung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/
416a5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag
416a6(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo
416a7(mdo sde): las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
416b1(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
416b2(mdo sde): po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs
416b3(mdo sde): su 'dzin par mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sber brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi
416b4(mdo sde): khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag bad/
416b5(mdo sde): ma bgyis pa legs par phyag padar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad
416b6(mdo sde): du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / me mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma
416b7(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
417a1(mdo sde): @na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang
417a2(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs
417a3(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po
417a4(mdo sde): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad dang mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na
417a5(mdo sde): med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung
417a6(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung
417a7(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar
417b1(mdo sde): yang bgyi'o/ / yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
417b2(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
417b3(mdo sde): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ mchod
417b4(mdo sde): pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid
417b5(mdo sde): rim gro mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid kyang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi bskyed/ bdag cag gi
417b6(mdo sde): lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu
417b7(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul
418a1(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der
418a2(mdo sde): yul rnams 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang /
418a3(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru ba skye bar 'gyur/ rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ bsdog pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs
418a4(mdo sde): tha dad pa nas skor mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i
418a5(mdo sde): gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan zin gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la
418a6(mdo sde): gzha'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag
418a7(mdo sde): po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de yang phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag
418b1(mdo sde): kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin
418b2(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
418b3(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong 'tshal bar
418b4(mdo sde): gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag/
418b5(mdo sde): tshigs thams cad 'pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs
418b6(mdo sde): pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar
418b7(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la
419a1(mdo sde): yang bsti stang bgyi/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gro bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i
419a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
419a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po ngos gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i
419a4(mdo sde): dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed
419a5(mdo sde): bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa
419a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad du 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag
419a7(mdo sde): stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du
419b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so/ / ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos
419b2(mdo sde): rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji
419b3(mdo sde): ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams 'pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag na nad 'go
419b4(mdo sde): ba ma mchis shang kha khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma' rgal po de dag gi se rang rang
419b5(mdo sde): gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang
419b6(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dbang dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang rim gro bgyid
419b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang
420a1(mdo sde): mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
420a2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
420a3(mdo sde): dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs
420a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de thams
420a5(mdo sde): cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs
420a6(mdo sde): rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlab dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang
420a7(mdo sde): srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
420b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang ba'i rgyal po 'di brnam pa' grwa ding rgya chen yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i
420b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar
420b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar
420b4(mdo sde): bstan/ yongs su bstan/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen nges mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
420b5(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal
420b6(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
420b7(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
421a1(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chu gcig dang / de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dil
421a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ri nas mdo sde'i dbang
421a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrungs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / '
421a4(mdo sde): gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po
421a5(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
421a6(mdo sde): bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po me kI mi bzang snyan
421a7(mdo sde): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum cu
421b1(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ / rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od gzer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i
421b2(mdo sde): spyan/ / rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin
421b3(mdo sde): brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang / / rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dri bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i
421b4(mdo sde): dbang po bzhin/ gser gyi ri ba lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po// yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//
421b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo//
421b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po rab mchog 'di/
421b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// mdo sde 'di ltar dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed dang /
422a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na
422a2(mdo sde): ngan song sdug bsngal dang / / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam bu'i gling
422a3(mdo sde): gnas rgyal po thams cad kyis/ / rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bsnyung bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs
422a4(mdo sde): nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing / / 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di na mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la
422a5(mdo sde): dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang / / rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa// pha rol dgra tshogs
422a6(mdo sde): zlog pa dge byed pa/ / mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byengad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung
422a7(mdo sde): khyim na yod pa ltar/ / rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha bas nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa
422b1(mdo sde): ltar/ / yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// ji ltar rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/
422b2(mdo sde): mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig
422b3(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ / bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang
422b4(mdo sde): bopo 'di ni bshad pa na/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga'
422b5(mdo sde): zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ / mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par 'gyur ba yi// lha yi tshigs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag
422b6(mdo sde): kun kyang rab dga' bas/ / mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid chen po yis ni
